channel.title: Video Edits on
channel.description: Recent content in Video Edits on

item.title: The Stigma Around Breastfeeding
item.description: This video was submitted to the “Supporting Mothers’ Breastfeeding Journey” Secondary School Short Video Competition and was merit awarded.

item.title: Creative Edit
item.description: This is one of the many video edits I created, where I use Adobe After Effects to express my creativity

item.title: A Geranium's Journey
item.description: This animation was submitted to the 2018「Movie Character Created By Me」- Video Competition hosted by the Hong Kong Playground Association and received Semi-Finalist (out of 1500 videos).

item.title: School Production: Decade
item.description: Decade is a school production about the 9/11 incident.
